subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Eagles said quarterback Donovan McNabb would not play tonight against the Patriots. A. J. Feeley will try to stop unbeaten New England. The Panthers downgraded the status of quarterback Vinny Testaverde to questionable after he had back stiffness.
